vocabularies.label: capacity
vocabularies.description: Electric charge capacity expressed in milliampere-hours (integer), typical for cells such as AA/AAA rechargeable batteries.

vocabularies.label: nominalVoltage
vocabularies.description: Nominal voltage of the battery in volts (decimal). e.g., 1.2 for NiMH cells.

vocabularies.label: chemistry
vocabularies.description: Battery chemistry type, such as NiMH, Li-ion, Alkaline, describing electrochemical family.

vocabularies.label: size
vocabularies.description: Physical size designation such as AA, AAA, 18650, describing standard form factors.

vocabularies.label: manufacturer
vocabularies.description: Name of the battery manufacturer or brand producing the cell.

vocabularies.label: weight
vocabularies.description: Weight of the battery in grams, representing the mass of the complete cell.

vocabularies.label: energyWh
vocabularies.description: Energy capacity in watt-hours (Wh), calculated from capacity and voltage.

vocabularies.label: rechargeable
vocabularies.description: Boolean indicating whether the battery can be recharged.

vocabularies.label: cycleLife
vocabularies.description: Number of charge-discharge cycles the battery can sustain before degradation.

vocabularies.label: operatingTemperature
vocabularies.description: Operating temperature range in Celsius for safe battery operation.
